    • Method Detail

      • prepareForModel

        public static Row prepareForModel​(DataFrame df,
                                  int rowToPredict,
                                  int[] targetIndexes)
        Prepares a dataframe for a model. Returns a row which will have target indexes chopped out. Removes row from dataframe, marks columns as targets.
        Parameters:
        df - the dataframe to prepare for a model.
        rowToPredict - the index of the row to predict.
        targetIndexes - the indexes of the columns to mark as targets.
        Returns:
        the row to predict which will have the target indexes chopped out.

      • prepareForModel

        public static Row prepareForModel​(DataFrame df,
                                  int rowToPredict,
                                  java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> targets)
        Prepares a dataframe for a model. Returns a row which will have target indexes chopped out. Removes row from dataframe, marks columns as targets.
        Parameters:
        df - the dataframe to prepare for a model.
        rowToPredict - the index of the row to predict.
        targets - currently only supports a collection of string names, collection of target indexes.
        Returns:
        the row to predict which will have the target indexes chopped out.

      • prepareForModel

        public static Row prepareForModel​(DataFrame df,
                                  int rowToPredict,
                                  java.lang.String targetName)
        Prepares a dataframe for a model. Returns a row which will have the index of the targets name chopped out.
        Parameters:
        df - the dataframe to prepare for a model.
        rowToPredict - the index of the row to predict.
        targetName - the name of the column to set as a target.
        Returns:
        the row to predict which will have the target index chopped out.

      • prepareForModel

        public static Row prepareForModel​(DataFrame df,
                                  int rowToPredict,
                                  int targetIndex)
        Prepares the dataframe for a model. Returns a row which will have the index of the target chopped out.
        Parameters:
        df - the dataframe to prepare for a model.
        rowToPredict - the index of the row to predict.
        targetIndex - the index of the column to mark as a target.
        Returns:
        the row to predict which will have the target index chopped out.
